markdown:
<title level="1" right="Skill " pfs="">[Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 242 <sup>2.0</sup>

You know about the natural world, and you command and train animals and magical beasts.

<title level="2">Nature Untrained General Actions</title>

- [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?ID=24&General=true) about fauna, flora, geography, weather, the environment, creatures of natural origin (like [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=531), [beasts](/Traits.aspx?ID=547), [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), and [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=668)), the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10), and the Elemental Planes.

<title level="2">Nature Trained General Actions</title>

- [Identify Magic](/Skills.aspx?ID=22&General=true), particularly magic of the [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) tradition.

- [Learn a Spell](/Skills.aspx?ID=23&General=true) from the [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) tradition.

<title level="2">Related Feats</title>

To see a list of Feats related to Nature, [click here](/feats?include-traits=skill&exclude-traits=archetype&include-skills=nature&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc).

<title level="2">Nature Untrained Actions</title>

<document level="3" id="action-2400" />
name: Nature
